= Toggles an objects properties using events =

<select id="x" style="width:200px;">
   <option>one</option>
   <option>two</option>
 </select>

<input type="button" value="Disable" onclick="jtoggler('x', 'disabled'),jtoggler('chBox', 'checked');"/> 
<input type="checkbox" id="chBox" onclick="jtoggler('chBox', '!checked');" /> some checkbox
<input type="button" value="Enable" onclick="jtoggler('x', '!disabled');"/>
